Name: Aopoa Khartu-al
Description:
Manufacturer: Aopoa
Focus: Light Fighter

The Xi'an Aopoa corporation manufactures an export model of the Qhire Khartu, the Khartu-al, for sale to human civilians as a dedicated scout/explorer. The export model features the same Xi'an maneuvering rig, but control surfaces modified for Human use and a more limited armament.
DescriptionText: The Xi'an Aopoa corporation manufactures an export model of the Qhire Khartu, the Khartu-al, for sale to human civilians as a dedicated scout/explorer. The export model features the same Xi'an maneuvering rig, but control surfaces modified for Human use and a more limited armament.
